chunk:
Alpha-H Vitamin E Serum with Macadamia

Brand: Alpha-H

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Polysorbate 80, Methyl Gluceth-20, Disodium Lauriminodipropionate Tocopheryl Phosphates, Phenoxyethanol, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed

lia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium Edta, Citric Acid, T-Butyl Alcohol.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
